Package ui

Class UiUtils

java.lang.Object
ui.UiUtils
public final class UiUtils extends Object
A utility class that provides reusable methods for JavaFX UI management. This includes: - Setting status messages on labels with color - Displaying pop-up alerts - Switching between screens (FXML) while injecting the active ClientController

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • setStatus

      public static void setStatus(Label label, String message, boolean isSuccess)
      Updates a label with a message and sets its text color based on status.
      Parameters:
      label - the label to update
      message - the message to display
      isSuccess - true for green (success), false for red (error)

    • showAlert

      public static void showAlert(String title, String content, Alert.AlertType type)
      Displays a JavaFX alert pop-up.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the dialog
      content - the message body
      type - the type of alert (INFO, WARNING, ERROR, etc.)

    • loadScreen

      public static void loadScreen(Button source, String fxmlPath, String title, ClientController client1)
      Loads a new FXML screen and switches to it. Also injects the ClientController into any controller that implements ClientAware. Some known controllers also register themselves back to the ClientController.
      Parameters:
      source - the button (or any node) from the current scene
      fxmlPath - the path to the FXML file
      title - the new window title
      client1 - the active client instance (can be null for guest mode)

    • setScene

      public static void setScene(Stage stage, Parent root, String title)
      Replaces the current scene with a new one, setting a fixed window size.
      Parameters:
      stage - the JavaFX stage (window)
      root - the root node of the new scene
      title - the title to display in the window

    • exitFromSystem

      public static void exitFromSystem()
      Handles the Exit button press - disconnects from the server (if needed) and closes the application.
